about_the_game:
Complete Over 30 Different Tracks

 There are so many different tracks to experience with their own unique visual aesthetic, and layouts. These tracks can vary in length, but can also offer a new challenge for player's wanting to explore all this game has to offer.

Try 5 Different Game Modes

 This game offers a wide range of different modes for you to enjoy, from chasing sequences to timed levels and much more. These modes will change some aspects about how you play and interact with the level, as they add new features and difficulties to the level, for the player to overcome in order to complete the track.

Unlock New Characters With Different Stats

 Unlock over 6 different characters each with their own set of skins and stats such as move speed, jump height and dash distance. These characters look and handle differently from one another, and it's just about finding the right character for you. With each coin you collect, you gain more currency to purchase skins for your characters.

Find Cool Powerups

 Be ready to pick up awesome powerups that gives you new features like invincibility, and piloting a giant mech that destroys everything in your way.

Unlock New Abilities

 Discover new skills like slowing time, rewinding time, and extra lives. These abilities offer a new way to play, as you learn how to use them and the best situations to use them in.

name: Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit or Windows® 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space

short_description: Race through a plethora of levels, customize your characters, and unlock new abilities.
